name: Barbara
desc: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>August 23, 2019</color>
Barbara, the Deaconess of the Knights of Favonius, is a shining starlet beloved by the people of Mondstadt.
Her Hydro power is the best remedy for a wound, just like her soothing singing and dancing is solace to a weary heart.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1164869925346959362</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 25, 2019</color>
"I just want to see Barbara to make my day a bit brighter!" —— the usual excuse of those accused by the nuns of loitering around the cathedral doors.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1165594695776591874</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 8, 2021</color>
Barbara's new outfit "Summertime Sparkle" will be coming soon to the game. Travelers can obtain this outfit for free after completing the "Echoing Tales" event.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/418568</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 5, 2020</color>
Barbara takes the stage!♪
This is a special birthday performance just for you, so enjoy the show!
Thanks to @呜拉祖啦 for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1279626054165020673</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 5, 2021</color>
I want to present a special performance for you.
You have always supported me and been there for me and I want to convey all my thanks through this song!
It's my first time singing it, I'm a little nervous...
—Let the show begin~☆
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1411897626362925059</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 5, 2021</color>
"La-lala—♪"
"This weather is so amazing! I could burst into song."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/516624</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 5, 2022</color>
"You're just in time. Could you please take some pictures for me?"
"A dancing Barbara, singing Barbara, and praying Barbara...
No wonder she's the Shining Idol of Mondstadt! Barbara's smile makes all the troubles go away~"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5810701</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 5, 2022</color>
Thank you for being here with me today. Legend has it that the wind at Windrise can guide us and relieve our fatigue.
My sister comes here when she feels lost and confused... S—So, I sometimes also...
When I close my eyes, I can feel a power rising within me and the wind gently blows away the mist in my heart...
I will try my best to become the person that everyone can rely on! That's my birthday wish!
Thanks to 朝日川日和 for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5810704</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 5, 2023</color>
Today, the cathedral was suddenly filled with people, all saying they had troubles they wished to confide in me.
But it turned out that none of them had any problems, and everyone was there to wish me a happy birthday.
I'm so happy! Not only because they remembered my birthday, but because I love seeing the smiles on everyone's faces!
And your smile right now is exceptionally dazzling!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/19820277</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 5, 2023</color>
"Traveler, today's my birthday! I've invited everyone to my party — would you like to come too?"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/19820279</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 5, 2024</color>
"♪ Happy birthday to you~ Barbara-sama ♪~ Happy birthday to you ♪~"
(He's singing so earnestly... I—I must encourage him...)
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/30639839</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 5, 2024</color>
Thank you for coming to listen to me sing! Today's setlist is my special birthday edition~
As for my birthday wish... Hehe, I hope to see a smile on everyone's faces, as always.
Are there any other songs you'd like to hear? I'd be happy to sing them for you~
Turning my wish into a song should make it more likely to come true!
Thanks to 碧風羽 for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/30639840</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 13, 2019</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
In Liyue Harbor, under the bright moon. The fragrance of osmanthus and the people admiring the moon are all shrouded in the bright silver glow. On this Mid-Autumn Festival night, why not put aside your daily chores and quietly enjoy this rare beauty?
“Travelers, let’s try Liyue’s special delicacies together.”
Thanks to the artist @青君-修仙greetings
~ Wishing everyone a happy Mid-Autumn Festival!
<color=#ffacff>Miyoushe:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.miyoushe.com/ys/article/178766</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 31, 2019</color>
Cape, bat, and pumpkin lantern. The Rose Witch is off~
Candy, candles and slimes! Enjoy the Halloween fun~
"The cathedral entrance is not for such revelry!"
—Did someone just say something? Or am I just hearing things...?
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1189859595650506752</color>

<color=#ffd780>December 24, 2019</color>
Everything seems so quiet during this wonderful night, but Christmas bells are about to ring.
Radiant with joy amid garlands and Christmas lights, Barbara hands you a gift full of surprises.
"Here is a very special gift for you, please accept it."
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1209323965996392449</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 14, 2021</color>
Today's Jean's birthday, and the Knights of Favonius have secretly prepared a full spread of fine dishes for her, just to celebrate the special occasion!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/242665</color>

<color=#ffd780>November 25, 2022</color>
I received an invitation letter for a banquet tonight, but I don't know if I should go...
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Paimon2theMoon/status/1595960463715667969</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 24, 2024</color>
"Good Hunter... Dish of the day... Sweet Madame."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/24561023</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 21, 2024</color>
"Oh, are you singing to wish me a happy birthday? Your voice sounds so lovely!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/26171677</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 24, 2024</color>
"Oh? Forsooth, such power befits well the might of the Immernachtreich, mwuhaha!"
"What mein Fräulein means to say is that you are dressed very appropriately for tonight."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/30227570</color>
Genshin Impact JP Twitter - 500 Thousand Followers Celebration

<color=#ffd780>October 12, 2020</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
Thanks to Traveler, the official Genshin Twitter account (@Genshin_7) has surpassed 500,000 followers!
To show our gratitude, we're giving away 24 Genshin character Twitter icons!
<color=#ffacff>Genshin:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/genshin.hoyoverse.com/ja/news/detail/104554</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 9, 2021</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Hello fellow travelers, the number of fans on the official Weibo of "Genshin Impact" has now exceeded 1 million.
<color=#ffacff>Weibo:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/m.weibo.cn/detail/4612807196413233</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 21, 2021</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Chinese]</color>
Hello travelers, the number of fans at the official Bilibili of Genshin Impact has exceeded 7 million.
<color=#ffacff>Bilibili:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/t.bilibili.com/561268907521156666</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 24, 2020</color>
Just 4 days until the global release of Genshin Impact on PlayStation®, iOS, Android, and PC!
We look forward to meeting you in Teyvat!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/17328</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 18, 2021</color>
With the Windblume Festival approaching fast, the TikTok short video event is also about to kick off! Send us your original short clips for a chance to obtain great cash prizes and Genshin Impact merchandise!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/252399</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 3, 2021</color>
The free and peaceful Mondstadt, as well as the bustling port of Liyue, mark every step of your journey.
The melodies of wind and rock intertwine on a whole new stage to compose a unique chapter of your adventure.
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 2, 2022</color>
This concert is presented by Genshin Impact and HOYO-MiX in collaboration with various musicians, and we sincerely invite Travelers to go on this wonderful musical journey with us.
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>

<color=#ffd780>April 6, 2023</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Korean]</color>
Hello travelers!
I brought you detailed news about Genshin X Pizza Alvolo~
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/genshinimpactkr/status/1643804195328516098</color>

customize.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
customize.desc: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.

customize.text:
Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers(3-star)
Characteristics:
<color=#ffd780>ATK</color> <color=#ffd780>Bonus</color> from stat, <color=#ffd780>HP Bonus</color> from secondary stat and <color=#ffd780>ATK</color> <color=#ffd780>Bonus</color> from Passive
Passive triggered will offer HP and DMG Bonus, to increase combat power and support
Low cost to obtain
Good transitional weapon for newbie
How to obtain:
Standard Wish

customize.name: Prototype Amber
customize.desc: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

customize.text:
Prototype Amber (4-star)
Characteristics:
<color=#ffd780>ATK</color> <color=#ffd780>Bonus</color> from stat, <color=#ffd780>HP Bonus</color> from secondary stat and <color=#ffd780>Energy Recovery</color> from Passive, <color=#ffd780>HP</color> Recovery to allies
<color=#ffffff73>Allows constant Energy Recovery under Elemental Burst to Barbara and</color> <color=#ffd780>HP</color> <color=#ffffff73>Recovery to allies every 2s, which boosts Energy Recharge and overall survivability</color>
Low cost to obtain
Decent 4-star weapon for <color=#333333>Barbara</color>
How to obtain:
Forge

customize.name: Everlasting Moonglow
customize.desc: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

customize.text:
Everlasting Moonglow (5-star)
Characteristics:
<color=#ffd780>ATK</color> <color=#ffd780>Bonus</color> from stat, <color=#ffd780>HP Bonus</color> from secondary stat and <color=#ffd780>Healing Amount Bonus</color> from Passive
Increases Normal Attack DMG based on HP limit. Each <color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color> will recover <color=#ffd780>Elemental Energy</color> by 0.6
When lacking enough <color=#ffd780>Healing</color> , Barbara needs regular <color=#ffd780>Charged Strike</color> among Normal Attacks to trigger the Melody Loop from Let the Show Begin♪ as well as the effect of Everlasting Moonglow to accelerate Energy Recharge
High cost to obtain
How to obtain:
Limited-time Event Wish

customize.name: Skyward Atlas
customize.desc: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

customize.text:
Skyward Atlas (5-star)
Characteristics:
<color=#ffd780>ATK Bonus</color> from both the main stat and secondary stat and <color=#ffd780>Elemental DMG Bonus</color> from Passive
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color> hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby opponents to <color=#ffd780>attack</color> for 15s
Attributes and appearance fit Barbara’s character positioning
High cost to obtain
How to obtain:
Standard Wish
Limited-time Event Wish
Recommended Artifacts

× <color=#ffffff73>4</color>
Characteristics:
2-pc Ocean-Hued Clam offers 15% <color=#ffd780>Healing Bonus</color>
4-pc Ocean-Hued Clam if <color=#ffd965>heals</color> an ally, a Sea-Dyed Foam will appear for 3s, accumulating the amount of HP recovered from healing, after which the Sea-Dyed Foam will explode, dealing DMG to nearby opponents based on 90% of the accumulated <color=#ffd965>healing</color> .
Reach Adventure Rank 45 before going for 5-star Artifacts
How to obtain:
Slumbering Court, which consumes 20 Original Resin each time

× <color=#ffffff73>4</color>
Characteristics:
2-pc <color=#ffffff73>Maiden Beloved offers 15% Healing Bonus</color>
4-pc <color=#ffffff73>Maiden Beloved offers 20%</color> <color=#ffd965>Healing Bonus</color> <color=#ffffff73>to all allies within 10s after Elemental Skill or</color> <color=#ffd965>Elemental Burst</color> <color=#000000>is cast</color>
Reach Adventure Rank 45 before going for 5-star Artifacts
How to obtain:
Valley of Remembrance, which consumes 20 Original Resin each time
Consume three 5-star Artifacts for an Artifact Strongbox

× <color=#ffffff73>2</color>
Characteristics:
2-pc Ocean-Hued Clam <color=#ffffff73>offers</color> 15% <color=#ffd780>Healing Bonus</color>
2-pc <color=#ffffff73>Maiden Beloved also offers</color> 15% <color=#ffd780>Healing Bonus</color>
This set with great <color=#ffd965>Healing Bonus</color> is more available, good transition for Barbara
Reach Adventure Rank 45 before going for 5-star Artifacts
How to obtain:
Slumbering Court, which consumes 20 Original Resin each time Valley of Remembrance, which consumes 20 Original Resin each time
Consume three 5-star Artifacts for an Artifact Strongbox

× <color=#ffffff73>4</color>
Characteristics:
<color=#ffffff73>2-pc</color> Wanderer's Troupe increases <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> by 80
<color=#ffffff73>4-pc</color> Wanderer's Troupe provides characters using Catalysts and Bows with 35% <color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color> DMG Bonus, a notable <color=#ffd780>boost</color>
Reach Adventure Rank 45 before going for 5-star Artifacts
How to obtain:
Boss challenge, which consumes 40 Original Resin
Spiral Abyss, which consumes 40 Original Resin
Trounce Domain, which consumes 60 Original Resin
Consume three 5-star Artifacts for an Artifact Strongbox

textualResearch.title: [Of Ballads and Brews] Barbara, Fecund Hamper

desc.text:
Clue
Happy Weinlesefest! I've placed the gift near the stage at the Wine Market. I hope that this gift will make the day of the person who finds it.
Message
Are you enjoying yourself in Weinlesefest?
Every time a festival comes along, the roads and streets are lined with all sorts of decorations, and the conversations people have with one another grow light-hearted. They talk about how they'll be spending the holiday, what they'll buy... Their happiness is truly infectious.
This harvest festival, I'd like to send you some small flags that I made myself. If they can be used as decorations to liven up your day, that would be great!
Barbara
Item
Shop Ornament: Birdie the Waiter, 20,000 Mora, Varunada Lazurite Fragment ×2

<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <color=#80c0ff>AoE Hydro DMG</color> after a short casting time.
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#80c0ff>AoE Hydro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Freedom
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

materials.name: Divining Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Freedom
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

materials.name: Sealed Scroll
materials.desc: An old scroll lacking in detail and clarity. By following the images on it, some magical creatures can recreate a small part of its magic.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Freedom
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

materials.name: Forbidden Curse Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll inscribed with ancient images. It is said that few can decipher its meaning, and the few scholars that have all went mad.

materials.name: Ring of Boreas
materials.desc:
A bit of crystallized ice from the Great Wolf King of the North.
This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. Though his power may have diminished, he could still freeze the land in an instant.

materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> to surrounding opponents and applying the <color=#80c0ff>Wet</color> status to them.
<color=#ffd780>Melody Loop</color>
· On hit, Barbara's Normal Attacks heal your own party members and nearby teammates for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP.
· On hit, Barbara's Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing.
· Periodically regenerates your own active character's HP.
· Applies the <color=#80c0ff>Wet</color> status to the character and to opponents who come in contact with them.
Barbara's music is the magic that heals her companions.

Heals your own party members and nearby teammates for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.
Barbara's desire to heal strengthens her will to fight and sing.
The Stamina Consumption of characters within <color=#ffd780>Let the Show Begin♪</color> 's Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

When your active character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of the Melody Loop of <color=#ffd780>Let the Show Begin♪</color> is extended by 1s.
The maximum extension is 5s.
When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.
Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

Decreases the CD of <color=#ffd780>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 15%.
During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> .

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Shining Miracle♪</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
· Automatically revives the fallen character.
· Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

Barbara is the Deaconess of the Church of Favonius, as well as the shining idol of Mondstadt.
"The sight of Barbara makes all my problems disappear." This is quite a common saying among the citizens of Mondstadt.
In fact, Barbara can do much more than just put people in a better mood: Her healing powers extend to flesh wounds and other physical ailments.
Barbara is known to have access to miraculous healing powers through her Hydro Vision.
However, Barbara herself knows that hard work is the most miraculous magic of all.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara.
However, this has not always been the case. At first, Barbara's songs sounded strange to the citizens of Mondstadt, and many struggled to see the appeal.
This was because for the longest time, the folk songs of bards were the only popular songs known in Mondstadt.
Fortunately, Mondstadt stayed true to its reputation as the City of Freedom, and the people ultimately embraced the new while continuing to cherish the old.
People accepted Barbara's songs, and over time her positive energy rubbed off on them. Soon, they could be heard humming her tunes all around Mondstadt.
"Albert, would you stop please! You're completely out of tune!"

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
Barbara's feelings on her own success are mixed.
To the extent that an idol's duty is to make everyone adore her, she has done a fantastic job.
There is no doubting that she has made the right choice.
However, an idol is also expected to spread joy and relieve people's spiritual fatigue... Has she really accomplished that?
She sang for blind Glory, encouraging her to believe that her lover would one day return. She sang, too, for sick Anna, promising her that her illness would one day be cured.
Yet, the smiles on their faces never last long after the songs end.
This has led Barbara to become somewhat disillusioned and doubtful.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Barbara has always been a bright and optimistic girl since she was young. Though at times she can be a bit clumsy and mess things up, she always bounces right back and has another go.
Barbara is the complete opposite of her sister, who is seen by all as the pride of her family.
Unlike Barbara, her sister has always been the very definition of success in all aspects.
Initially, all Barbara had ever wanted was to surpass her sister in at least one thing, even if only once.
However, be it swordplay, her grades, or anything else, she was never able to compare.
Even for someone as optimistic as her, she found herself to be upset and down.
"Hard work is the most miraculous magic. But when even that doesn't work... what then?"

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
Barbara has never once considered giving up.
Her determination and resilience even surprised her father, Seamus Pegg, the Cardinal of Daybreak.
Barbara only allows herself to be depressed for 30 seconds.
After that, she forces herself to brighten up, no matter what.
"I'm not so good in combat, so I'll be sure to support those who are."
Under her father's counsel, Barbara became a healer.
She is as radiant as the sick and injured are pained.
Her desire to be recognized gradually transformed into a simple desire to help others.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
"Thank you" are the two words that Barbara hears most often.
When she feels lost, she will suddenly find that there is someone wanting to hold her hand.
"Thanks for being here with me. I feel so much better."
To Barbara, the greatest reward is seeing the smiles on people's faces.
Therefore, whenever she is massaging her swollen calves or drinking tea to care for her sore throat, Barbara recalls all those who have been kind to her.
"It's the encouragement I receive from others that keeps me going."
Just maybe, the smiles she receives are proof that her songs really can heal people.
Her ambition to surpass her sister and become the most popular person in all of Mondstadt hasn't been abandoned by Barbara, it is simply buried deep inside her heart.
"If only I excelled more, perhaps I could be of help to Jean."
This is what she believes.
"Okay... Barbara, go!"

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
"...Idol?"
The first time that Barbara heard this strange word, she was visibly confused.
"But... aren't The Seven the ones that people are supposed to worship?"
"Yes, but not exclusively..." replied Alice, an elder of the Hexenzirkel, as she groomed the young girl for stardom. "Read this, it contains everything you will need to know."
"Idol Magazine" was the name of the assigned reading material. Barbara had no idea what world this magazine had come from, but by reading it she found out that there was indeed such thing as an "idol," and that it mainly involved working hard at getting everyone to like you.
She also discovered that an outstanding idol is capable of not just bringing joy to themselves, but also bringing spiritual healing to others through the power of song and dance.
Barbara set about learning one new song after another, dancing to the beat as she went. Finally, she found happiness, and she found it in the smiling faces of others.
Some time later, when Alice anxiously relayed to Barbara that plans for "Teyvat Idols!" were falling through, Barbara was starting to make a name for herself through her performances in Mondstadt.
"Hmm... Well, if I'm the only one left... I guess you can leave it to me to define what it really means to be an idol!"
Driven by this ever so slightly selfish ambition to spread joy and healing to others, Barbara is slyly swotting up on new tunes behind the scenes to this very day.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
The story of how Barbara obtained her Vision is hardly the typical tale of high-stakes heroism.
She had just joined the church and was looking after a little boy with a high and persisting fever.
Nothing Barbara could think of would console the boy and bring an end to his relentless tears.
Someone remarked that while the boy had already taken his medicine, there was no way to cure the pain of missing one's family.
Another suggested that Barbara sing a song for the boy to raise his spirits.
Barbara had never sung a song in her life up until this point, but how could she shy away from it in a moment like this?
"Never having sung before is no reason to abandon a child in their time of need," Barbara thought to herself.
And so, Barbara took the boy in her arms and sang him a song: a lullaby, the only song she knew.
It was an unceremonious beginning to her singing career. After quickly realizing that she barely knew any of the words, she had to resort to humming the tune instead.
Nevertheless, her voice began to soothe the child, and so she kept singing. She sang the same song, over and over again, until her throat was dry and her voice was hoarse. Finally, the boy fell asleep. Exhausted, Barbara lay down by the wall and fell straight asleep herself.
Early the next morning, Barbara awoke to discover that the boy's fever had come down. Perhaps it was because she had sung for him, or perhaps it had something to do with the Vision which had mysteriously appeared next to her hand at some point during the night.
Barbara was not preoccupied with the Vision, however. It was the sight of the boy smiling once again that filled her heart with joy.
Barbara received her Vision for the simple but beautiful wish that took hold in her heart that night: A dream of healing the sick through the power of song.

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Innocent Longing
Barbara's outfit. A Deaconess's uniform from the Church of Favonius with a unique Barbara streak running through it.

Obtained Outfit - Summertime Sparkle
Barbara's beach attire. This pretty skirt brims with summer vitality and carries with it a cool ocean breeze.
Barbara's songs and dances are meant to heal everyone's hearts.
But sometimes, even Barbara, who brings smiles onto everyone's faces, will herself feel down.
She, too, wishes to hang out with close friends and spend quality time with her family, much like any other girl her age.
These small wishes seem simple to anyone else, but they are a luxury for Barbara.
As an idol, she is often surrounded by zealous fans when she goes out.
And when she can steal moments to be with her family, the time she can spend with her parents and sister is ever so brief.
Her brilliant, busy sister is often stuck to her desk due to official business, and every time Barbara wants to go to her to share her feelings, she is silenced by the mountain of work piled in front of Jean.
Her sister's exhaustion is plain to see, and Barbara sees it too.
It can't be helped: Jean Gunnhildr is everyone's Acting Grand Master.
"But... could you just... give me my sister back, just for a while?"
Barbara says this to herself while watching her busy sister.
And that was when she heard a rumor about a strange archipelago.
Summer, islands, the ocean... could this be her hard-come-by opportunity?
Summer meant refreshing drinks, sweet icy desserts, and golden sands, azure seas, and people playing in the water.
The sand... the sea... Yes! So it was decided.
But a seaside trip requires preparation.
Snacks, sweets... ah yes, and Spicy Dried Fish, too. All this, she placed into her cute yellow ducky bag. ♪
Oh, and let's not forget clothes! I'll need some light and comfy swimwear. This short skirt looks good — and those little white flowers lend a playful look to those shoes! ♪
And perhaps a little bow tied around the neckline, would that look cuter?
Barbara began to hum happily to herself: La~ la la la la~ la la! ♪
But there was no way her sister would have time to prepare any swimwear for herself, would she?
That was quite the pickle... Still, there were ways around that.
Barbara pushed the door of the library open with a smile. "Do you have time, Miss Lisa? I'd like your help with picking a set of clothes."

videoCollection.title: Barbara's Special Video: An Idol's Healing Magic
EP - Tales Told by the Wind｜Genshin Impact
Outfit Teaser: Teyvat Style – Beachside Ballad | Genshin Impact
Version 1.6 "Midsummer Island Adventure" Trailer | Genshin Impact

materials.name: Philanemo Mushroom
materials.desc: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.

materials.name: Divining Scroll
materials.desc: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

materials.name: Mora

materials.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

materials.name: Cleansing Heart
materials.desc:
A palmful of eternal water left by an oceanid.
Though it has already diffused among the depths of the lake, its purity remains all the same. But why would a creature so pure and clean as an oceanid covet the appearance of a being that roams the land, and assume such a form with pure water? They need not breathe nor do they require sustenance...

"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: Tada! *giggles* Barbara is here~ Leave the healing to me, I will not disappoint you!

voice.title: Chat: Sleepiness
voice.desc: *yawn* All this standing around is making me so sleepy...

voice.title: Chat: Encouragement
voice.desc: Everyone is working super hard, we should be too!

voice.title: Chat: Keeping One Refreshed
voice.desc: Are you tired? Try my new spicy energy drink, I'm sure it'll wake you up!

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: Don't stay out in the rain for too long, you'll catch a cold!

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes
voice.desc: Whoa!

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: Ooh, snowflakes! Look at them dance!

voice.title: When the Sun Is Out
voice.desc: This weather is so amazing! I could burst into song.

voice.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
voice.desc: Don't worry! I will not... be blown away!

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Morning~ Let's do our best today.

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: Oh? You want to hear me sing...? Sorry, the show is... It hasn't started yet.

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: I really want to eat some spicy squid at Good Hunter... but my stomach, er... Never mind...

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: We had a great day today! Get some rest.

voice.title: About Barbara
voice.desc: "To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward. When I'm uncertain, bless me with the wisdom to distinguish good from evil. When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back..." ...Oops, my apologies, I was just doing my prayers. *giggles* You need something?

voice.title: About Us: Hopes
voice.desc: My dream is to bring a smile to the faces of all the people in my life! As long as I can help you on your journey, I'm happy~

voice.title: About Us: Dreams
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Thank you for being with me for all this time, I can feel that I'm getting closer to my dream. Hope we can keep this up in the future~!

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Everyone has their own desires. To bring together and fulfill those desires and make everyone happy — this is the purpose my Archon has bestowed upon me.

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: I could never get bored of the breathtakingly beautiful nature that surrounds Mondstadt. I've heard that there are blue trees that exist by the sea shore near Inazuma City. I just need to save up a little more, and... What's that? You want to know what I'm saving up for? *chuckles* That's my little secret.

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: Sunflowers always face the sun. They're so bright. In fact, my mother sent me a sunflower-style dress... I wonder when I'll finally get to wear it on stage?

voice.title: About Jean
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Acting Grand Master... Leader of the Knights of Favonius... Everyone seems to like her a lot. Oh? Me? I... Of course I have nothing but admiration for her!

voice.title: About Lisa
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I always take good care of Lisa. If she ever wants to become a star, she'll have my unconditional support, I'll cheer at the top of my lungs until my voice goes hoarse... Hmm, that might scare off her other fans though...

voice.title: About Amber
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I've seen Amber rushing out of Mondstadt on a mission countless times. Being an Outrider doesn't look easy.

voice.title: About Diluc
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Oh, Master Diluc? Last time, when I was performing at Angel's Share, he kept frowning... Maybe he doesn't like my singing?

voice.title: About Venti
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Venti's voice is amazing! But the songs he sings and the ones I'm good at are very different. I tried to learn them but... the melodies are just so complicated.

voice.title: About Bennett
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Bennett always comes to the cathedral covered in scrapes and bruises... Though it clearly never bothers him a bit, given the big grin he always has on his face. He really should take better care of himself.

voice.title: About Varka
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

My father left on the expedition with Grand Master Varka... I hope they are okay. Oh, what am I worried about? The Grand Master is none other than the Knight of Boreas, of course they will be fine! Still, I will be sure to pray for their safe return.

voice.title: About Rosaria
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Sister Rosaria is hard to get to know, especially given she never joins in on prayers, but... Oh, I'm sure she believes in the Anemo Archon! Although, I still don't really have the courage to try to talk to her...

voice.title: About Noelle
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Noelle is just the cutest! She's so kind and patient, you just feel totally relaxed when you're around her. ...Oh yeah, and she makes the tastiest snacks! Best part is, they're also healthy. Tee-hee!

voice.title: More About Barbara: I
voice.desc: Knights look so cool when they swing their sword in combat! Don't you think so? I tried using a sword before but... *sigh* Uh, let's just say I have zero talent with a sword.

voice.title: More About Barbara: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

I want to heal everyone. This simple thought was all the motivation I needed to become a Deaconess. As long as I'm able to help everyone, I'll be content.

voice.title: More About Barbara: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Being an idol, I learned from Alice that "A true idol should always try to heal the soul of the people..." Yes, I completely agree.

voice.title: More About Barbara: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

I'm doing my best everyday... I hope my efforts earn the trust of the people of Mondstadt.

voice.title: More About Barbara: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Every time I get on stage I always start to doubt myself — can I really heal every person in Mondstadt? But I look at you now, and I feel that as long as we keep marching forward, maybe one day I might just— Huh? I've already healed you? Well, one's not enough! I've already healed a lot of people? I suppose...

voice.title: Barbara's Hobbies
voice.desc: The smiles on the faces of the people I've helped keeps me going.

voice.title: Barbara's Troubles
voice.desc: My companions keep getting injured, but I'm unable to share the burden of their pain. The only thing I can do is my absolute very best to heal their wounds! I'll make sure that everyone is healthy.

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: Do you like spicy dried fish? I have two in my bag. Here, have one!

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: I don't like anything bitter, especially... ugh, bitter gourd.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: It's a rare pleasure to eat food that suits my tastes so well. Today is a blessed day!

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: Thank you for cooking these for me. This time around, you are the one healing me!

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: Oh, uh, oh dear...

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Here you go! This is the gift I got for your birthday, along with my exclusive autograph! Hehe, when my next song comes out, I'll make sure you're the first one to hear it! Happy birthday!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 1

A dance from Barbara, to bring you more healing!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 2

Aw, thank you so much for your support! Oh no, I'm too excited, my heart just can't stop racing!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 4

Please, tell me how I can be stronger! Just leave it up to you? No, no, that won't do! I want to help too!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 6

Traveling with you, I have discovered that the world is my stage! Thank you so much! *giggles* Ok! Let's shout it one more time! Three, two, one — Go Barbara, go!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: I'll protect us!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Let's dance!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Let the show begin!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: ♪La la-la-la-la~

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Ready, steady go!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Come on, we can do it!

voice.title: Sprint Start: I
voice.desc: Go Barbara, go!

voice.title: Sprint End: I
voice.desc: *pant*... I'm fine!

voice.title: Sprint End: II
voice.desc: *pant* Keep going...

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: This is the kind of surprise I could sing about.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Oh, look at it sparkle!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Hmm hmm hmm♪ Things are going so smoothly today~

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Don't worry about me!

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: I can't stop now, they need me!

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: Gotta keep trying!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: I don't want to see you hurt...

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Please, let me tend to your wounds!

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: I feel... a little weak...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: Why has everyone stopped singing?

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: Sister...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Ouchie!

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Oh no!

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: I'll take care of it.

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: Wish me luck!

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: We can do this!

value.name: Spicy Stew
value.desc: Barbara's specialty. Carrots cut into cute little stars make this dish... Wait, AHH, where did this spiciness come from!?

value.name: Barbara
value.desc:
"Shining Idol" Barbara

Ready to heal hearts and soothe souls at any time.
